thread.title: Director/Owner of Musical Arts Schoolhouse Chris Duncan featured on NBC as Guest on Success Today.
thread.title_full: Director/Owner of Musical Arts Schoolhouse Chris Duncan featured on NBC as Guest on Success Today.

author: prbuzz.com
title: Director/Owner of Musical Arts Schoolhouse Chris Duncan featured on NBC as Guest on Success Today.
text:
Executive Director and Owner of Musical Arts Schoolhouse, Chris Duncan, was recently seen on NBC, CBS, ABC, and FOX network affiliates around the country as a guest on Success Today with Bob Guiney.
FRISCO, TX October 23, 2015— Chris Duncan was recently featured as a guest on Success Today with Bob Guiney. The show was filmed in Orlando, Florida and features an interview with Bob “The Bachelor” Guiney as host. The episode with Chris recently aired on affiliates of ABC, NBC, CBS, and FOX around the country. Success Today with Bob Guiney is produced by the 3x Emmy Award Winning Director/ Producer and CelebrityFilms team.
The Musical Arts Schoolhouse is a Private Day School for Preschool and Kindergarten in Frisco, Texas. The goal of the school is to teach challenging academics through the performing arts (daily music, art, dance, theatre plus Spanish). Chris is the owner and executive director the Musical Arts Schoolhouse. She holds a BA degree in Piano Pedagogy and Music Theory from Michigan State University.
Watch Chris Duncan’s appearance on “Success Today” here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3_ali0tgUlg
To learn more about the Musical Arts Schoolhouse, visit www.MusicalArtsSchoolhouse.com.
More About Chris Duncan:
Chris Duncan has loved playing the piano on the very first day her fingers first touched those ivory keys, and she knew that she wanted to be a teacher and help others embrace exploring their gifts through learning.
Chris believes strongly in family involvement in continued learning and always brings enthusiasm, energy, and a joyful love of teaching to everything she is involved in. Today, Chris lives in Little Elm, TX and has two grown sons, one who is a jazz pianist.
Notable Awards and Accomplishments:
o Best Selling Author; Quilly Award Winner
o Licensed Preschool Director, Texas Department of Family and Protective Services
o NCTM Nationally Certified Teacher of Music, Permanent Certificate, Music Teachers National Association – Piano, Theory
o Founding, Charter Member of the Carrollton Music Teachers Association
o Member, Texas State Music Teachers Association
o Member, Music Teachers National Association
o Member, Texas Licensed Childcare Association
o Early Childhood Music & Movement Association, National Board Member 1995-1997
